title: Free Transfer Back to NA from OCE
body: Sooo... 2 years ago I switched over to the OCE server and I didn't know that there was a promotion to go back to the NA servers for free.  I stopped playing because I was lagging so hard on the OCE servers.  Does anyone know when the next free promo back to NA is?  sigh :(

replies.body: Ummmm bro If you are getting poor performance over here it's gonna be worse in NA lol

> [{quoted}](name=fattyhotdogs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=A1z5msbA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-25T07:22:23.331+0000)
>
> Ummmm bro If you are getting poor performance over here it's gonna be worse in NA lol

OCE's servers are garbage.
90% of the you drop packets.

Would take OCE servers with a ping of 30 over NA servers with 200.

If OCE is so garbage why are you here?

Honestly, I feel like 'server hating' is just a fad. I don't see nearly the amount of trouble that people complain about. Anytime I see 'fekin servers' in game, I reply with 'close that pRon streaming in the background
The free transfer system works like osmosis. They never have free transfers from low population regions (OCE) to high population regions (NA). It's always the opposite.

If you really live in OCE, good luck actually getting less lag from across the world.

Otherwise, why would an NA player move to OCE?!
